    <section class="description">
     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for developing, releasing, monitoring and troubleshooting large scale micro-service based distributed systems with high transaction volume. You enjoy learning new things and are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. </p>
        <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Key Qualifications</strong></strong>
        <ul>
         <li>a Bachelor's or higher degree in the technical field of study or equivalent practical experience </li>
         <li>strong hands-on experience with Java (minimum 8 years) </li>
         <li>experience with high volume production-grade distributed systems </li>
         <li>experience with micro-service based architecture </li>
         <li>experience with software engineering best practices, coding standards, code reviews, testing and operations </li>
         <li>hands-on experience with Spring Boot </li>
         <li>professional experience in writing readable, testable and self-sustaining code </li>
         <li>knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Docker </li>
         <li>excellent troubleshooting and creative problem-solving abilities </li>
         <li>excellent written and oral communication in English and interpersonal skills </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Ideally, candidates will also have</strong></strong>
        <ul>
         <li>experience with Big Data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra </li>
         <li>experience with CI/CD toolchain products like Jira, Stash, Git, and Jenkins </li>
         <li>fluent with functional, imperative and object-¬≠oriented languages; </li>
         <li>experience with Scala, C++, or Golang </li>
         <li>knowledge of Machine Learning </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Location: Home office from your domicile</strong></strong>
       </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar m√°s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar m√°s
        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>
      </section>

    <section class="description">
     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for developing, releasing, monitoring and troubleshooting large scale micro-service based distributed systems with high transaction volume. You enjoy learning new things and are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. </p>
        <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Key Qualifications</strong></strong>
        <ul>
         <li>a Bachelor's or higher degree in the technical field of study or equivalent practical experience </li>
         <li>strong hands-on experience with Java (minimum 8 years) </li>
         <li>experience with high volume production-grade distributed systems </li>
         <li>experience with micro-service based architecture </li>
         <li>experience with software engineering best practices, coding standards, code reviews, testing and operations </li>
         <li>hands-on experience with Spring Boot </li>
         <li>professional experience in writing readable, testable and self-sustaining code </li>
         <li>knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Docker </li>
         <li>excellent troubleshooting and creative problem-solving abilities </li>
         <li>excellent written and oral communication in English and interpersonal skills </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Ideally, candidates will also have</strong></strong>
        <ul>
         <li>experience with Big Data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra </li>
         <li>experience with CI/CD toolchain products like Jira, Stash, Git, and Jenkins </li>
         <li>fluent with functional, imperative and object-¬≠oriented languages; </li>
         <li>experience with Scala, C++, or Golang </li>
         <li>knowledge of Machine Learning </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Location: Home office from your domicile</strong></strong>
       </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar m√°s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar m√°s
        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>
      </section>
     </div>

   <section class="description">
    <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
     <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
      <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
       <p>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for developing, releasing, monitoring and troubleshooting large scale micro-service based distributed systems with high transaction volume. You enjoy learning new things and are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. </p>
       <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Key Qualifications</strong></strong>
       <ul>
        <li>a Bachelor's or higher degree in the technical field of study or equivalent practical experience </li>
        <li>strong hands-on experience with Java (minimum 8 years) </li>
        <li>experience with high volume production-grade distributed systems </li>
        <li>experience with micro-service based architecture </li>
        <li>experience with software engineering best practices, coding standards, code reviews, testing and operations </li>
        <li>hands-on experience with Spring Boot </li>
        <li>professional experience in writing readable, testable and self-sustaining code </li>
        <li>knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Docker </li>
        <li>excellent troubleshooting and creative problem-solving abilities </li>
        <li>excellent written and oral communication in English and interpersonal skills </li>
       </ul>
       <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Ideally, candidates will also have</strong></strong>
       <ul>
        <li>experience with Big Data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra </li>
        <li>experience with CI/CD toolchain products like Jira, Stash, Git, and Jenkins </li>
        <li>fluent with functional, imperative and object-¬≠oriented languages; </li>
        <li>experience with Scala, C++, or Golang </li>
        <li>knowledge of Machine Learning </li>
       </ul>
       <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Location: Home office from your domicile</strong></strong>
      </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar m√°s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar m√°s
       <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
       <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>
     </section>
    </div>

     <li class="job-criteria__item"><h3 class="job-criteria__subheader">Tipo de empleo</h3><span class="job-criteria__text job-criteria__text--criteria">Jornada completa</span></li>
     <li class="job-criteria__item"><h3 class="job-criteria__subheader">Funci√≥n laboral</h3><span class="job-criteria__text job-criteria__text--criteria">Tecnolog√≠a de la informaci√≥n</span><span class="job-criteria__text job-criteria__text--criteria">Ingenier√≠a</span></li>

  <section class="description">
   <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
    <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
     <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
      <p>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for developing, releasing, monitoring and troubleshooting large scale micro-service based distributed systems with high transaction volume. You enjoy learning new things and are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. </p>
      <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Key Qualifications</strong></strong>
      <ul>
       <li>a Bachelor's or higher degree in the technical field of study or equivalent practical experience </li>
       <li>strong hands-on experience with Java (minimum 8 years) </li>
       <li>experience with high volume production-grade distributed systems </li>
       <li>experience with micro-service based architecture </li>
       <li>experience with software engineering best practices, coding standards, code reviews, testing and operations </li>
       <li>hands-on experience with Spring Boot </li>
       <li>professional experience in writing readable, testable and self-sustaining code </li>
       <li>knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Docker </li>
       <li>excellent troubleshooting and creative problem-solving abilities </li>
       <li>excellent written and oral communication in English and interpersonal skills </li>
      </ul>
      <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Ideally, candidates will also have</strong></strong>
      <ul>
       <li>experience with Big Data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra </li>
       <li>experience with CI/CD toolchain products like Jira, Stash, Git, and Jenkins </li>
       <li>fluent with functional, imperative and object-¬≠oriented languages; </li>
       <li>experience with Scala, C++, or Golang </li>
       <li>knowledge of Machine Learning </li>
      </ul>
      <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Location: Home office from your domicile</strong></strong>
     </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar m√°s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar m√°s
      <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
      <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>
    </section>

 <section class="description">
  <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
   <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
    <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
     <p>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for developing, releasing, monitoring and troubleshooting large scale micro-service based distributed systems with high transaction volume. You enjoy learning new things and are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. </p>
     <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Key Qualifications</strong></strong>
     <ul>
      <li>a Bachelor's or higher degree in the technical field of study or equivalent practical experience </li>
      <li>strong hands-on experience with Java (minimum 8 years) </li>
      <li>experience with high volume production-grade distributed systems </li>
      <li>experience with micro-service based architecture </li>
      <li>experience with software engineering best practices, coding standards, code reviews, testing and operations </li>
      <li>hands-on experience with Spring Boot </li>
      <li>professional experience in writing readable, testable and self-sustaining code </li>
      <li>knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Docker </li>
      <li>excellent troubleshooting and creative problem-solving abilities </li>
      <li>excellent written and oral communication in English and interpersonal skills </li>
     </ul>
     <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Ideally, candidates will also have</strong></strong>
     <ul>
      <li>experience with Big Data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra </li>
      <li>experience with CI/CD toolchain products like Jira, Stash, Git, and Jenkins </li>
      <li>fluent with functional, imperative and object-¬≠oriented languages; </li>
      <li>experience with Scala, C++, or Golang </li>
      <li>knowledge of Machine Learning </li>
     </ul>
     <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Location: Home office from your domicile</strong></strong>
    </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar m√°s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar m√°s
     <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
     <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>
   </section>

   </div>
   <div class="find-a-referral__cta-container">
    <p>Las recomendaciones duplican tus probabilidades de conseguir una entrevista con Numbrs </p><a class="find-a-referral__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D3244624&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_find-a-referral-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_find-a-referral-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>Mira a qui√©n conoces</a>
   </div>
  </div>
 </section>

<section class="description">
 <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
  <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
   <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
    <p>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for developing, releasing, monitoring and troubleshooting large scale micro-service based distributed systems with high transaction volume. You enjoy learning new things and are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. </p>
    <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Key Qualifications</strong></strong>
    <ul>
     <li>a Bachelor's or higher degree in the technical field of study or equivalent practical experience </li>
     <li>strong hands-on experience with Java (minimum 8 years) </li>
     <li>experience with high volume production-grade distributed systems </li>
     <li>experience with micro-service based architecture </li>
     <li>experience with software engineering best practices, coding standards, code reviews, testing and operations </li>
     <li>hands-on experience with Spring Boot </li>
     <li>professional experience in writing readable, testable and self-sustaining code </li>
     <li>knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and Docker </li>
     <li>excellent troubleshooting and creative problem-solving abilities </li>
     <li>excellent written and oral communication in English and interpersonal skills </li>
    </ul>
    <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Ideally, candidates will also have</strong></strong>
    <ul>
     <li>experience with Big Data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra </li>
     <li>experience with CI/CD toolchain products like Jira, Stash, Git, and Jenkins </li>
     <li>fluent with functional, imperative and object-¬≠oriented languages; </li>
     <li>experience with Scala, C++, or Golang </li>
     <li>knowledge of Machine Learning </li>
    </ul>
    <p><br> </p><strong><strong>Location: Home office from your domicile</strong></strong>

<section aria-modal="true" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="create-alert-modal-modal-header" tabindex="-1" class="modal__wrapper create-alert-modal__wrapper guest-job-alert-modal__wrapper">
